page.title: 09LEISURE IN GLENAGOORLAND
page.content: One of the most common hobbies in this area is watching television.Favourite programmes are the news and Dallas. Cricket is the most popular sport in our area.A lot of people are interested in this and some of the men play for local teams in Donemana and Bonds Glen. Some men and women play darts around here for a team and win trophies.Some men play snooker and love watching it on television. Gardening is also a common hobby as most people keep nice gardens. A lot of the women do quite a bit of knitting and sewing.Most women also enjoy baking and make a lot of their bread and cakes and buns . Alot of the women belong to organizations like the Women's Institute,the Mother's Union and the P.W.A.
